00020 bool CUBE_GRID::CreateMemory()
00021 {
00022         vertices=new CUBE_GRID_VERTEX[(maxGridSize+1)*(maxGridSize+1)*(maxGridSize+1)];
00023         if(!vertices)
00024         {
00025                 //errorLog.OutputError("Unable to allocate memory for %d Grid Vertices", numVertices);
00026                 return false;
00027         }
00028 
00029         cubes=new CUBE_GRID_CUBE[maxGridSize*maxGridSize*maxGridSize];
00030         if(!cubes)
00031         {
00032                 //errorLog.OutputError("Unable to allocate memory for %d Grid Cubes", numCubes);
00033                 return false;
00034         }
00035 
00036         return true;
00037 }
00038                 
00039 bool CUBE_GRID::Init(int gridSize)
00040 {
00041         
00042         //VERTICES
00043         numVertices=(gridSize+1)*(gridSize+1)*(gridSize+1);
00044         
00045         int currentVertex=0;
00046 
00047         for(int i=0; i<gridSize+1; i++)
00048         {
00049                 for(int j=0; j<gridSize+1; j++)
00050                 {
00051                         for(int k=0; k<gridSize+1; k++)
00052                         {
00053                                 vertices[currentVertex].position.Set
00054                                                 ((i*20.0f)/(gridSize)-10.0f, (j*20.0f)/(gridSize)-10.0f, (k*20.0f)/(gridSize)-10.0f);
00055 
00056                                 currentVertex++;
00057                         }
00058                 }
00059         }
00060 
00061         //CUBES
00062         numCubes=(gridSize)*(gridSize)*(gridSize);
00063 
00064         int currentCube=0;
00065 
00066         for(int i=0; i<gridSize; i++)
00067         {
00068                 for(int j=0; j<gridSize; j++)
00069                 {
00070                         for(int k=0; k<gridSize; k++)
00071                         {
00072                                 cubes[currentCube].vertices[0]=&vertices[(i*(gridSize+1)+j)*(gridSize+1)+k];
00073                                 cubes[currentCube].vertices[1]=&vertices[(i*(gridSize+1)+j)*(gridSize+1)+k+1];
00074                                 cubes[currentCube].vertices[2]=&vertices[(i*(gridSize+1)+(j+1))*(gridSize+1)+k+1];
00075                                 cubes[currentCube].vertices[3]=&vertices[(i*(gridSize+1)+(j+1))*(gridSize+1)+k];
00076                                 cubes[currentCube].vertices[4]=&vertices[((i+1)*(gridSize+1)+j)*(gridSize+1)+k];
00077                                 cubes[currentCube].vertices[5]=&vertices[((i+1)*(gridSize+1)+j)*(gridSize+1)+k+1];
00078                                 cubes[currentCube].vertices[6]=&vertices[((i+1)*(gridSize+1)+(j+1))*(gridSize+1)+k+1];
00079                                 cubes[currentCube].vertices[7]=&vertices[((i+1)*(gridSize+1)+(j+1))*(gridSize+1)+k];
00080 
00081                                 currentCube++;
00082                         }
00083                 }
00084         }
00085 
00086         return true;
00087 }
00088 
00089 void CUBE_GRID::DrawSurface(float threshold)
00090 {
00091         numFacesDrawn=0;
00092 
00093         static SURFACE_VERTEX edgeVertices[12];
00094         
00095         glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES);
00096         {
00097                 //loop through cubes
00098                 for(int i=0; i<numCubes; i++)
00099                 {
00100                         //calculate which vertices are inside the surface
00101                         unsigned char cubeIndex=0;
00102         
00103                         if(cubes[i].vertices[0]->value < threshold)
00104                                 cubeIndex |= 1;
00105                         if(cubes[i].vertices[1]->value < threshold)
00106                                 cubeIndex |= 2;
00107                         if(cubes[i].vertices[2]->value < threshold)
00108                                 cubeIndex |= 4;
00109                         if(cubes[i].vertices[3]->value < threshold)
00110                                 cubeIndex |= 8;
00111                         if(cubes[i].vertices[4]->value < threshold)
00112                                 cubeIndex |= 16;
00113                         if(cubes[i].vertices[5]->value < threshold)
00114                                 cubeIndex |= 32;
00115                         if(cubes[i].vertices[6]->value < threshold)
00116                                 cubeIndex |= 64;
00117                         if(cubes[i].vertices[7]->value < threshold)
00118                                 cubeIndex |= 128;
00119         
00120                         //look this value up in the edge table to see which edges to interpolate along
00121                         int usedEdges=edgeTable[cubeIndex];
00122 
00123                         //if the cube is entirely within/outside surface, no faces                      
00124                         if(usedEdges==0 || usedEdges==255)
00125                                 continue;
00126         
00127                         //update these edges
00128                         for(int currentEdge=0; currentEdge<12; currentEdge++)
00129                         {
00130                                 if(usedEdges & 1<<currentEdge)
00131                                 {
00132                                         CUBE_GRID_VERTEX * v1=cubes[i].vertices[verticesAtEndsOfEdges[currentEdge*2  ]];
00133                                         CUBE_GRID_VERTEX * v2=cubes[i].vertices[verticesAtEndsOfEdges[currentEdge*2+1]];
00134                                 
00135                                         float delta=(threshold - v1->value)/(v2->value - v1->value);
00136                                         //edgeVertices[currentEdge].position=v1->position + delta*(v2->position - v1->position);
00137                                         edgeVertices[currentEdge].position.x=v1->position.x + delta*(v2->position.x - v1->position.x);
00138                                         edgeVertices[currentEdge].position.y=v1->position.y + delta*(v2->position.y - v1->position.y);
00139                                         edgeVertices[currentEdge].position.z=v1->position.z + delta*(v2->position.z - v1->position.z);
00140                                         //edgeVertices[currentEdge].normal=v1->normal + delta*(v2->normal - v1->normal);
00141                                         edgeVertices[currentEdge].normal.x=v1->normal.x + delta*(v2->normal.x - v1->normal.x);
00142                                         edgeVertices[currentEdge].normal.y=v1->normal.y + delta*(v2->normal.y - v1->normal.y);
00143                                         edgeVertices[currentEdge].normal.z=v1->normal.z + delta*(v2->normal.z - v1->normal.z);
00144                                 }
00145                         }
00146 
00147                         //send the vertices
00148                         for(int k=0; triTable[cubeIndex][k]!=-1; k+=3)
00149                         {
00150                                 glNormal3fv(edgeVertices[triTable[cubeIndex][k+0]].normal);
00151                                 glVertex3fv(edgeVertices[triTable[cubeIndex][k+0]].position);
00152 
00153                                 glNormal3fv(edgeVertices[triTable[cubeIndex][k+2]].normal);
00154                                 glVertex3fv(edgeVertices[triTable[cubeIndex][k+2]].position);
00155 
00156                                 glNormal3fv(edgeVertices[triTable[cubeIndex][k+1]].normal);
00157                                 glVertex3fv(edgeVertices[triTable[cubeIndex][k+1]].position);
00158                                                                 
00159                                 numFacesDrawn++;
00160                         }
00161                 }
00162         }
00163         glEnd();
00164 }
00165 
00166 void CUBE_GRID::FreeMemory()
00167 {
00168         if(vertices)
00169                 delete [] vertices;
00170         vertices=NULL;
00171         numVertices=0;
00172 
00173         if(cubes)
00174                 delete [] cubes;
00175         cubes=NULL;
00176         numCubes=0;
00177 }
